title: Software Engineer
description:
**About the Job** 




 We are looking for an individual to join our Engineering team for a twelve\\-month contract, which can be extended for another year based on the candidate's performance.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are seeking a technically sharp Software Engineer to assist with backend logic and robust test automation. The ideal candidate is a polyglot programmer with deep system\\-level debugging skills and a high proficiency in AI\\-assisted development.
 



  





**Pay range and compensation package
 
 :** 
 5 \\- 10 LPA
 



  









**Qualifications:** 




 The candidate should have an experience of 1\\-3 years in the same domain.
 



  





  





**Required Skills**



* Proficiency in at least two of the following languages: Node.js, Java, Python, or C\\#.
* Strong knowledge of testing methodologies and hands\\-on experience with frameworks such as Playwright, Cypress, or Selenium.
* Must be capable of triaging running processes, analyzing memory consumption/leaks, and debugging network layer nuances.
* Advanced proficiency with VS Code (extensions, debugging tools).
* Must be comfortable using GitHub Copilot or similar AI agents to accelerate coding, refactoring, and documentation.
* Solid understanding of REST APIs and HTTP protocols.
* Proficiency with Git version control.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
* Clear communication skills for documenting bugs and technical blockers.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.

 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.

 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.

 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.

 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Automotive Embedded Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Ettiksoft Technologies Pvt. Ltd, established in 2019 by experienced technocrats from the automotive industry, specializes in innovative engineering solutions. The company focuses on key automotive areas such as Electrification, Autonomous Driving, Vehicle Control Units, Virtualization, and SaaP Solutions. Its team has a proven track record in product development and engineering services, including achievements in bootloader development, smart gate systems, and verification and validation environments. Ettiksoft offers diverse services in system engineering, software development, hardware design, and mechanical components. The company is headquartered in Coimbatore and fosters a culture of expertise and innovation.
 



  





**Requirements:** 



* Strong Embedded C programming
* Experience with microcontrollers (ARM / Renesas / NXP / STM)
* Knowledge of CAN, UART, SPI, I2C
* Basic RTOS understanding
* Debugging skills (JTAG / Lauterbach)








**Good to Have:** 
 Automotive exposure / AUTOSAR basics
 



 ¬†
 



**Educational Qualification** 



* B.E / B.Tech in ECE / EEE / Instrumentation / Computer Science or related field



 ¬†
 



**Why Join Us?** 



* Opportunity to work on advanced embedded and automotive projects
* Growth\\-focused environment
* Exposure to international clients
* Continuous learning and development



  





  





 Send your updated resumes to hr@ettiksoft.com

title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Associate Backend Engineer** 




  





**Job Summary:** 
 We are looking for an enthusiastic and motivated Associate Backend Engineer with 1 to 3 years of experience to join our growing engineering team. Whether you're a recent graduate or have some industry experience, this role offers a strong foundation to grow your skills in real\\-world backend development. You‚Äôll work closely with experienced engineers and contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of scalable backend systems that power our products.
 



  





 This position is ideal for individuals who are eager to learn, write production\\-grade code, and grow into a high\\-performing backend engineer.
 



 Website: https://www.thealteroffice.com/about
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Assist in building and maintaining backend services and APIs for web and mobile applications.
* Work with both relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) databases for data modeling and storage.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code under guidance.
* Contribute to authentication, authorization, and other core backend features.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including product, frontend, and QA to deliver complete features.
* Participate in code reviews and incorporate feedback to improve code quality.
* Debug issues, write unit/integration tests, and help maintain service reliability and performance.
* Learn to work with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and deployment workflows.
* Use tools like Docker, basic cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure), and optionally explore monitoring/logging tools.
* Explore new technologies such as GraphQL, WebSockets, or message queues (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ) when relevant.



**Requirements:** 



* 1 to 2 years of backend development experience, including internships, academic projects, freelance, or open\\-source work.
* Familiarity with at least one backend programming language (e.g., JavaScript, Python, Java, Go, etc.).
* Basic understanding of RESTful APIs, HTTP, databases, and server\\-side logic.
* Exposure to SQL and NoSQL databases and understanding of CRUD operations.
* Familiarity with Git and fundamental development workflows.
* Willingness to learn and apply best practices in scalability, security, and asynchronous programming.
* Strong problem\\-solving mindset and eagerness to take feedback and grow.
* Good communication and collaboration skills in a team environment.

title: ERPNext Developer ‚Äì Stock & Inventory
description:
Urgent Hiring ERP NEXT Developer
 



 for Client side
 



  





**ERPNext Developer ‚Äì Stock \\& Inventory (2‚Äì4 Years Experience)** 









**2‚Äì3 years of hands\\-on ERPNext development, with real production experience in Stock** 




**\\& Inventory.** 




**Training\\-only or demo\\-only experience does not qualify.** 









 Role Summary
 








**We are looking for an ERPNext developer who actually understands how inventory works** 




**in the real world, not someone who just customized forms. You will work primarily on** 




**Stock, Inventory, and related accounting flows, and you will be expected to modify core** 




**behavior when required not just write client scripts.** 




**Key Responsibilities** 




**Core ERPNext / Frappe Work** 




**‚Ä¢ Customize and extend ERPNext Stock \\& Inventory modules** 




**‚Ä¢ Develop Server Scripts, Client Scripts, Custom Apps** 




**‚Ä¢ Write and maintain Python (Frappe Framework) code** 




**‚Ä¢ Create and modify DocTypes, Workflows, Reports, Print Formats** 




**Stock \\& Inventory (Must\\-Have)** 




**You must have worked with:** 




**‚Ä¢ Item Master (UOMs, Variants, Item Groups)** 




**‚Ä¢ Warehouses (hierarchy, default warehouses)** 




**‚Ä¢ Stock Ledger Entries (SLE) ‚Äì you must understand how they work** 




**‚Ä¢ Stock Reconciliation (valuation impact, common pitfalls)** 




**‚Ä¢ Material Request (Purchase, Transfer, Manufacture)** 




**‚Ä¢ Purchase Receipt \\& Delivery Note flows** 




**‚Ä¢ Stock Transfers \\& Inter\\-Warehouse movemen** 




**Batch\\-wise and Serial Number tracking** 




**‚Ä¢ Valuation Methods:** 




**o FIFO** 




**o Moving Average** 




**‚Ä¢ Negative stock handling and validation** 




**‚Ä¢ Backdated stock entries and their impact** 




**Integration \\& Automation** 




**‚Ä¢ Custom validations on stock transactions** 




**‚Ä¢ Automation using Hooks and Event Handlers** 




**‚Ä¢ REST API usage for stock/inventory integrations** 




**‚Ä¢ Background jobs and schedulers (when required)** 




**Technical Skills (Non\\-Negotiable)** 




**‚Ä¢ Strong Python** 




**‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of Frappe Framework** 




**‚Ä¢ ERPNext v14\\+ experience preferred** 




**‚Ä¢ MariaDB / MySQL (queries, joins, performance basics)** 




**‚Ä¢ JavaScript for ERPNext UI customization** 




**‚Ä¢ Git (basic branching, pull, push, conflict resolution)** 




**‚Ä¢ Linux server basics (logs, bench commands)** 




**üì© How t** 
 o Apply
 



 Apply directly through
 **LinkedIn** 




**OR** 




**üìß Share your resume at: careers@aimsureglobalsol**

title: MLE Intern
description:
**Company Description** 




 MockVerse is an AI\\-powered platform designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and real\\-world hiring expectations. By offering role\\-specific mock interviews crafted with insights from industry professionals, MockVerse enables students and early\\-career professionals to practice in realistic, company\\-style environments. The platform provides structured, data\\-driven feedback on skills such as communication, problem\\-solving, technical depth, and articulation, helping users track their progress and improve iteratively. MockVerse also partners with educational institutions to assist in scaling interview readiness and improving student outcomes. Our mission is to make high\\-quality interview preparation accessible to help candidates approach their job opportunities with confidence.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This fully remote MLE Internship at MockVerse is a hands\\-on, system\\-focused role centered on speech systems and conversational AI POCs.
 



 You will work on data migration, data creation, and data management tasks that directly support model development and platform improvements. The role includes exposure to GCP tools and close collaboration with our CTO Arnab.
 



 Ideal for candidates genuinely passionate about machine learning and willing to work on foundational engineering and data tasks that power real\\-world AI systems.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* Strong command over Python
* Ability to understand and work with conversational/interaction data (especially SDE interview\\-style dialogues)
* Exposure to MongoDB, VS Code, GitHub, LLM workflows, and coding assistants (e.g., Antigravity)
* Willingness to work on core engineering tasks including data\\-heavy and operational work
* Genuine curiosity and passion for machine learning beyond buzzwords
* Strong ownership mindset and readiness to learn by building



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Exposure to speech systems, NLP, or LLM\\-based applications
* Familiarity with data preprocessing, annotation, and pipeline creation
* Basic understanding of cloud environments (preferably GCP)



  





**Who Should Apply** 




 Students or recent graduates in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or related fields who want deep, practical exposure to real\\-world ML systems and are comfortable getting their hands dirty working on foundational data and engineering problems that drive meaningful product improvements.

title: Lead Engineer | 1L-2L pm | 5+Y Experience
description:
About the Role:
 



  





 DevDolphins is seeking a hands\\-on Engineering Lead to drive the technical delivery of our enterprise\\-grade projects. You will architect robust solutions, mentor a talented team, and champion quality and innovation in our Hyderabad office. Remote is ok but within max 6 months, you must be open to relocating to Hyderabad.
 



  





 What You'll Do:
 


* Lead the end\\-to\\-end technical delivery of projects using GCP/AWS, React, and Python.
* Write clean, maintainable code and conduct thorough code reviews to elevate team output.
* Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering a culture of technical excellence.
* Advocate for and implement best practices in test\\-driven development (TDD), code quality, and technical debt reduction.
* Leverage AI coding agents to enhance productivity while rigorously reviewing and owning the generated code.
* Collaborate on platform engineering and DevOps initiatives, with a preference for experience in serverless architectures (GCP/AWS).



  





 What We're Looking For:
 


* 5\\+ years of software development experience with a strong command of¬†Python¬†and/or¬†Java.
* Proven experience leading the delivery of¬†enterprise\\-grade projects.
* Deep passion for software craftsmanship, attention to detail, and a debt\\-free technology mindset.
* Strong platform engineering understanding and practical experience with cloud platforms (GCP/AWS preferred).
* A collaborative team player who takes full ownership of projects and their technical outcomes.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.



  





 Our Interview Process:
 


1. Offline Coding Exercise
2. Online Live Coding \\& Technical Discussion
3. Final HR \\& Values Round
